title: Differentially Private Sharpness-Aware Training. (arXiv:2306.05651v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Training deep learning models with differential privacy (DP) results in a degradation of performance. The training dynamics of models with DP show a significant difference from standard training, whereas understanding the geometric properties of private learning remains largely unexplored. In this paper, we investigate sharpness, a key factor in achieving better generalization, in private learning. We show that flat minima can help reduce the negative effects of per-example gradient clipping and the addition of Gaussian noise. We then verify the effectiveness of Sharpness-Aware Minimization (SAM) for seeking flat minima in private learning. However, we also discover that SAM is detrimental to the privacy budget and computational time due to its two-step optimization. translated_title: 差分隐私锐化感知训练
translated_abstract: 使用差分隐私进行训练会导致深度学习模型性能下降。本文研究了私有学习的几何属性，提出了一种新的锐化感知的训练方法，以缓解隐私-优化的制约关系。
tldr: 本文提出了一种能够缓解隐私-优化制约关系的锐化感知训练方法。
